Modele

Class Facile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Modele.Facile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Strategie

    public class Facile
extends java.lang.Object
implements Strategie
    This class implements the Visitor design pattern. This is the easy variant that does everything randomly.
    Author:
    dinh_, tran_
